Class KlotskiModel

public class KlotskiModel extends Object

    • KlotskiModel

      public KlotskiModel()

  • Method Details

    • initState

      public void initState(int id_configuration) throws SQLException
      Used when is opened a new game, ask the database for the necessary information to create a new State
      Parameters:
      id_configuration - is the number of the desired configuration (0-3)
      Throws:
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)

    • resumeState

      public void resumeState(String game_name) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Used when a game is resumed between ones of the already saved
      Parameters:
      game_name - is the name of the saved game
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - if the player is not logged in to the system
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout or not existing game)

    • restartState

      public void restartState()
      Used when a game is restarted, in order to reinitialize the State object

    • initDatabase

      public void initDatabase() throws SQLException
      Necessary action to initialize the connection with the database, in order to use the application
      Throws:
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)

    • getCurrentPositions

      public Rectangle[] getCurrentPositions()
      Returns:
      array[10] representing the current positions of the pieces

    • setSelectedPiece

      public void setSelectedPiece(Point p)
      Parameters:
      p - Point contained in the desired piece to select

    • moveSelectedPiece

      public Move moveSelectedPiece(Point p) throws RuntimeException
      Parameters:
      p - Point contained in the desired final location of the selected piece
      Returns:
      Move done
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - when the move is invalid

    • hasWin

      public boolean hasWin()

    • getCounter

      public int getCounter()

    • undo

      public Move undo() throws RuntimeException
      Returns:
      last move reversed
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - when there are no moves to undo

    • login

      public void login(String username, String password) throws RuntimeException, SQLException
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no player is registered with those username and password or null value
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)

    • registration

      public void registration(String username, String password) throws IllegalArgumentException, RuntimeException, SQLException
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the form of the strings are invalid (null or empty)
      RuntimeException - when there are conflicts inside database (two user with same username)
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)

    • logout

      public void logout()

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String name, boolean resumed) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalAccessException, SQLException
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - when the player isn't logged into the database
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)
      IllegalArgumentException - when tha name is invalid (blank or already used)

    • getSavedGameList

      public Vector<String> getSavedGameList() throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Returns:
      names of found saved games of that logged player
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - when the player isn't logged into the database
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)

    • deleteSavedGame

      public void deleteSavedGame(String name) throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException, NullPointerException
      Delete the game with that name, if not found the database call doesn't do anything
      Parameters:
      name - game name that is wanted to be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)
      IllegalAccessException - when the player isn't logged into the database
      NullPointerException - when the string is null

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll() throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Delete all the games of the logged user
      Throws:
      SQLException - when database raise an Exception (timeout)
      IllegalAccessException - when the player isn't logged into the database

    • delUser

      public void delUser() throws SQLException, IllegalAccessException
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IllegalAccessException

    • nextBestMove

      public Move nextBestMove() throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurred with the POST request
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - when the received JSON is invalid

      public void closeDatabaseConnection()
